description:
There are various issues with nova-instancemonitor as it stands. In particular it uses twisted (triggering some issues like bug 762551) and doesn't really work.

It either needs to be revamped in Eventlet and unbroken, or it needs to be removed.
title: nova-instancemonitor needs to be refreshed or dumped
